'''Heated Battle Mode: Tactical Formation''' is an [[Event]] for [[Genius Invokation TCG]] in [[Version 4.2]].

==Event Details==
===Duration===
* 2023/11/25 10:00:00 – 2023/12/11 03:59:59

===Requirements===
* [[Adventure Rank]] 32 or above
* Complete the Archon Quest "[[Song of the Dragon and Freedom]]"
* Complete the World Quest "[[Battlefield of Dice, Cats, and Cards]]"

===Summary===
* After the event starts, Travelers can go to the Invitation Board of The Cat's Tail to participate in "Genius Invokation TCG" duels under the special rules of "Heated Battle Mode."
* The special rule for this edition is: <section begin="special_rule" />Travelers must use Character Cards selected on the spot and randomly generated Action Cards to do battle.<section end="special_rule" />
* Travelers can invite teammates or participate in duels via match-making after reaching Player Level 4.

==Gameplay Notes== 
* Before the duel begins, you can see the details of all the preset decks and cards that will appear in the duel.
* The first player to choose selects 1 Character Card, and the second player to choose will then select 2 Character Cards. The first player will then select another 2 Character Cards, and then the second player will select I Character Card.
* After both players have selected all their cards, the duel begins. The first player to choose the cards will start first.

==Preset Decks==
Each deck contains an additional 6 random action cards.
